name: debug hero
description:
right-click and inspect the game window to play

open your browser's debug console and go on a magical adventure through unknown worlds!

in "debug hero" the places, enemies, and items are all procedural

debug hero commands:

  • d(e) - explore the local region for baddies and loot
  • d(p) - view your player statistics
  • d(r) - pay to rest in an inn to regain your health
  • d(b) - fight the boss of the local region
  • d(t) - travel to another region
  • d(h) - view this help command list

press ctrl + r to restart the game
